summary: In my opinion the dragon armour is way underpowered so in this very simple but effective mod it does just that, making it more powerful than Daedric armour making that perk worth while.
descriptionHtml:
In my opinion the dragon armour is way underpowered so in this very simple but effective mod it does just that, making it more powerful than Daedric armour making that perk worth while. 

So this mod affects both plate and scale variants of the dragon armour making both of them more powerful than the Daedric armour.

Installation:
Very simple just download with manager or move the files into the data folder.

Versions:
1.0
author: Madnessg0ld
